name: Bindy's 2 Dimensional Trip Demo
description:
Bindy's 2 Dimensional Trip is the second unfinished instalment in the behated Bindy's Basics horror, spoof, parody franchise. Created for a university assignment, all the love and care was put into the design, but not so much the programming. The developer apologises for their lack of knowledge within Unity's scripting. It is their first time using the engine.

For this instalment we've completely ditched it's 3D roots and gone for an NES themed 2D platformer! If you would like to complain, feel free to leave your rants down in the comments.

This demo includes:

1 Level
